h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Boshan Censer Location
content: Once you have defeated Red Loong, you can open the chest to finish everything in the area, obtaining the Boshan Censer in the process.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Boshan_Censer.md', within the main section titled 'Boshan Censer', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Boshan Censer Location'.
The content is as follows:
Once you have defeated Red Loong, you can open the chest to finish everything in the area, obtaining the Boshan Censer in the process.
